name: On Earth as in Hell: Woytons Plague
name_original: On Earth as in Hell: Woytons Plague
description:
Is a ps1-style horror game set in a small, quiet town.

You are a resident, who works in the city market, and who has to go through dark and scary paths to get to your shift.

But on that day you find something strange, a mark in the back of the supermarket.

Who knows what it might mean?

Mode: Single player

Genres: Horror, 80s Slacher

**The music and sounds in the game are not copyrighted.**

Game Duration: about 10 minutes

(The game only has 1 ending)

Controls:

W-A-S-D: Move

MouseButton(0): Interact

MouseButton(1): Zoom

Q: End Conversation

E: Drop Itens

LSHIFT: Run

If you have any questions my discord tag is Henri#8781
